1x
 
'use strict';
 
const is = require('is');
 
class VirtualType {
    constructor(name, options) {
        this.name = name;
        this.getter = null;
        this.setter = null;
        this.options = options || {};
    }
 
    get(fn) {
        if (!is.fn(fn)) {
            throw new Error('You need to pass a function to virtual get');
        }
        this.getter = fn;
        return this;
    }
 
    set(fn) {
        if (!is.fn(fn)) {
            throw new Error('You need to pass a function to virtual set');
        }
        this.setter = fn;
        return this;
    }
 
    applyGetters(scope) {
        if (this.getter === null) {
            return null;
        }
        const v = this.getter.call(scope);
        scope[this.name] = v;
        return v;
    }
 
    applySetters(value, scope) {
        if (this.setter === null) {
            return null;
        }
        const v = this.setter.call(scope, value);
        return v;
    }
}
 
module.exports = VirtualType;
 
Code coverage generated by istanbul at Sun Apr 08 2018 14:43:53 GMT+0200 (CEST)
